snippet.title: TV Review: Detroit Gang Squad
snippet.description: Voyeuristic docu about elite gang-busting police force.

snippet.title: TV Review: Detroit 1-8-7
snippet.description: Gritty detective show is entertaining but violent.

snippet.title: DVD Review: Detroit Rock City
snippet.description: A valentine to sex, drugs, and cutting school.

snippet.title: Music Review: Riot!
snippet.description: MTV darlings are clean punk-pop with an edge.

snippet.title: Television Review: Motor City Motors
snippet.description: Reality show features custom cars, economic woes, and hope.

snippet.title: Game Review: City Life
snippet.description: Smart game lets kids build cities -- and skills.

snippet.title: The Insane Hall Of Fame
snippet.description: Are you a member of the Insane Hall of Fame yet? If you are a parent, chances are you already are. Writer Caroline offers some insight into her induction.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: The Black Dahlia
snippet.description: Unsolved Hollywood murder inspires dark '40s noir.

snippet.title: Hot Modern Mom: Crystal Windham of General Motors
